Package org.sontana

Class UIActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.Behaviour
      • org.sontana.Pawn
        • org.sontana.Actor
          • org.sontana.UIActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler, org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler
    public class UIActor
extends Actor
    UIActor objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered and react to input. Unlike Actor objects, they do not react to the position of Camera.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon
